primarySegments.name: Aspiring Entrepreneurs
primarySegments.description: Individuals looking to start their own business and need data-driven validation for their ideas.

psychographics: Interest in startups and business trends
problemsNeeds: Lack of resources to conduct market research
behaviors: Frequent use of online business tools

primarySegments.name: Small Business Owners
primarySegments.description: Owners of small businesses seeking to expand or pivot with validated business decisions.

problemsNeeds: Need to validate new business ideas
Limited time for extensive market research

primarySegments.name: Corporate Innovators
primarySegments.description: Professionals in corporate innovation roles tasked with exploring new business opportunities.

demographics: Advanced degrees in business or related fields
problemsNeeds: Need for quick and reliable market insights
Pressure to innovate within corporate structures
Desire for tools that integrate with existing systems
